synopsis.text: Yuukei Yesterday, Outer Science, Summer Time Record, and Shounen Brave are just a few of the 13 music videos featured in Mekakucity V's, a stunning collection of songs from the popular Kagerou Project series. This unique project, created by multiple editors, delves into the lives and stories of the nine members of the Mekakushi-dan, also known as the Blindfold Gang. With 10 of the videos previously released on DVD and a special bonus MV of Shounen Brave created specifically for this collection, Mekakucity V's is a must-see for fans of the Kagerou Project and newcomers alike. Experience the full HD music videos and uncover the secrets of the Blindfold Gang.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
